mod_compat_valheim_version_error_descrip: The server runs Valheim $1, while your client runs Valheim $2
mod_compat_valheim_version_upgrade: Please update your game to Valheim $1 or contact your server admin
mod_compat_valheim_version_downgrade: Please downgrade your game to Valheim $1 or contact your server admin
mod_compat_version_string_description: This may indicates that mods are missing on one side. Not all mods change the version string equally or even require to be installed on both server and client. Please check the requirements of the listed mods
mod_compat_additional_mods_description: Please contact your server admin or uninstall the following mods
mod_compat_missing_mod: $1 $2 was not loaded on your game
mod_compat_additional_mod: $1 $2 was not loaded on the server
